scripts.build-vendor: npm run build-prime & npm build build-elements & npm run build-moofx & npm run build-mustache
scripts.build-demo: browserify -x prime -x prime-util/prime/options -x prime/emitter -x mout -x elements -x moofx dist/demo/app.js --debug | exorcist build/demo.js.map > build/demo.js
scripts.watch-demo: watchify -x slick -x mout -x prime -x prime-util/prime/options -x prime/emitter -x mout -x elements -x moofx --debug dist/demo/main.js -o 'exorcist build/demo.js.map > build/demo.js' -v
scripts.watch-element: watchify -x mout/array/forEach -x mout/time/now -x mout -x prime -x prime-util/prime/options -x prime/emitter -x mout -x elements -x slick -x moofx --debug dist/element/main.js -o 'exorcist dist/element/main.js.map > dist/element/bundle.js' -v
scripts.watch: npm run watch-lib & npm run watch-css
